attributes.action: Allow all public places e.g schools, work places and shopping malls to have a room for prayer and worship.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Praying is part of every religion and it should be allowed for people to carry out wherever they may be.

If a prayer room or even a place of worship is built in all public areas it would be very benifical.
